title: Use of ":" inside of arguments
author: t2_97zxr94

comments.author: Wilfred-kun
comments.body:
It is called "type hinting". It tells the programmer what types _should_ be passed to the function, but Python does not actually do any checking. It's just for the programmer to know what to input into the function.

Edit: [Relevant PEP](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0484)
